lead_paragraph: Air pollution is rapidly increasing in Asian cities and not all masks protect equally.

headline.print_headline: Not All Face Masks Shine as Pollution Blockers
headline.main: That Cloth Mask for Smoggy Days? A Paper One Works Better

snippet: Air pollution is rapidly increasing in Asian cities and not all masks protect equally....
abstract: Study in The Journal of Exposure Science and Environmental Epidemiology compares masks frequently worn in Asian cities to prevent prevent lung damage from air pollution and finds steep differences in efficacy; surprisingly, cheap paper surgical masks perform nearly as well as more expensive masks and far better than low-cost cloth masks.
